Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Discipline cat food bowl guardian system

Complete cat monitoring and discipline system that:
- Detects cats using YOLOv8
- Identifies individual cats \(Abbi vs Ilana\) using trained classifier
- Monitors bowl zones and tracks which cat is at which bowl
- Sprays water when Ilana eats from Abbi''s bowl

Includes:
- Camera capture module \(Raspberry Pi Camera or USB webcam\)
- Cat detection using YOLOv8
- Cat identification using feature-based classifier
- Bowl zone monitoring with violation detection
- GPIO-controlled water sprayer
- Training and calibration scripts
- Systemd service for production deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

components: Raspberry Pi 4, camera module, solenoid valve, relay,
power supplies, tubing, nozzles, jumper wires, and enclosure.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
